compiledCloudFormationTemplate.Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

Properties.Name: api-notas-dev | Validate request body and querystring parameters

C:\\dev\\DFX5-Tech-Interview\\serverless.serviceRawFile:
# "service" is the name of this project. This will also be added to your AWS resource names.
service: api-notas

frameworkVersion: '4'

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: python3.12
  stage: dev
  region: us-east-2
  
  # Permisos IAM para Lambda
  iamRoleStatements:
    - Effect: Allow
      Action:
        - dynamodb:PutItem
        - dynamodb:GetItem
        - dynamodb:UpdateItem
        - dynamodb:DeleteItem
        - dynamodb:Query
        - dynamodb:Scan
      Resource:
        - "arn:aws:dynamodb:${self:provider.region}:*:table/${self:custom.tableName}"

  # Variables de entorno
  environment:
    DYNAMODB_TABLE: ${self:custom.tableName}

custom:
  tableName: notas
  pythonRequirements:
    dockerizePip: non-linux

plugins:
  - serverless-python-requirements

functions:
  createNote:
    handler: handler.create_note
    events:
      - http:
          path: notas
          method: post
          cors: true

  getNote:
    handler: handler.get_note
    events:
      - http:
          path: notas/{id}
          method: get
          cors: true
          request:
            parameters:
              paths:
                id: true

resources:
  Resources:
    NotasTable:
      Type: AWS::DynamoDB::Table
      Properties:
        TableName: ${self:custom.tableName}
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: id
            AttributeType: S
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: id
            KeyType: HASH
        BillingMode: PAY_PER_REQUEST
